News.headline: Ticket Information: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.page_title: Ticket Information: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.URL_keywords: Ticket Information: Dagenham and Redbridge vs. Worthing
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Dagger's Buildbase FA Trophy 1st Round game against Worthing on Saturday 10th December.
News.description:
Please note that the TBS Stand will be closed for this game for both home and away fans and the AGP Steel Family Stand will be open for away fans has been allocated for Worthing supporters.

Don't miss out on our reduced prices for our Buildbase FA Trophy home fixture against Worthing, season tickets are not valid for cup games, so make sure you get your tickets for the game. 

Any Dagger's season ticket holders in the TBS or Family Stand who would like a specific seat for the game, if you get in contact with the club ticket office we will offer you the best seats available in our Carling Stand for the game.

Any Carling Stand season ticket holders who would like to reserve their seat for the game are asked to do so in advance of the game as season ticket holders seats that have not been reserved will go on sale on the turnstiles for the game on the day of the match. Season ticket holders unable to get along to the Club Shop prior to the game can ring the Club Shop and purchase their seats for collection on the day.

Purchase: 
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21 
Club shop: Opening Times

Admission prices for the game: 

Carling & Family Stand:
Adults - £12.00
Concessions - £8.00
10-16 - £1.00*
Under 10's - £1.00*
*when purchased with an adult ticket. 

Terrace:
Adults - £10.00
Concessions - £6.00
10-16 - £1.00*
Under 10s - £1.00*
*when purchased with an adult ticket.
